body_html:
Thanks for bringing this to our attention. This was fixed in the r0.12 branch in 1e317b1 but not the r0.11 branch, which I'll do now. In the meantime you can change the URL in tensorflow/workspace.bzl to http://zlib.net/fossils/zlib-1.2.8.tar.gz.

I'll also mention that at HEAD we now using redundant mirroring when downloading external dependencies. So problems like these should hopefully never arise again.
body_text:
Thanks for bringing this to our attention. This was fixed in the r0.12 branch in 1e317b1 but not the r0.11 branch, which I'll do now. In the meantime you can change the URL in tensorflow/workspace.bzl to http://zlib.net/fossils/zlib-1.2.8.tar.gz.
I'll also mention that at HEAD we now using redundant mirroring when downloading external dependencies. So problems like these should hopefully never arise again.
body:
Thanks for bringing this to our attention. This was fixed in the r0.12 branch in https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/commit/1e317b1f7dc5ccf04fc51ac96d97f5bdaefa9af9 but not the r0.11 branch, which I'll do now. In the meantime you can change the URL in tensorflow/workspace.bzl to http://zlib.net/fossils/zlib-1.2.8.tar.gz.

I'll also mention that at HEAD we now using redundant mirroring when downloading external dependencies. So problems like these should hopefully never arise again.
